I've just played the game 'Wizard' by Tim Hamilton and found some bugs.
The first one isnt new. If a key is expected to continue and you click into the gamewindow, the focus on the inputfield is removed and every keystroke is ignored.
2. Tim uses a 'Spell Commands'-menu in the menubar. If you restart the game, the entries of the menu are doubled
3. If you want to 'View Spellcasting Instructions' from the menu, you get a placeholder in the gamewindow (wrong path? missing image?)
Played offline with a Questversion created from source
